(/get-funding-help) data-section="header_button" Search data-section="header_search" data-section="title_tagline" Toggle Menu data-section="mobile_trigger" Search data-section="header_search" #masthead Accelerating Innovations Into Care – Alberta Innovates Receive up to $600,000 in Government Funding. Alberta Innovates‘ (https://www.mentorworks.ca/government-funding/research-development/alberta-innovates/) Accelerating Innovations Into Care program supports the commercialization of health technologies through collaborations of Alberta SMEs and public health providers. Companies will work with healthcare providers or post-secondary institutions to test and validate the innovation’s impacts, with specific emphasis on disease pathways or workflow. Funding Amount Up to $600,000 per project for up to a 36 month period for eligible expenses. Read More Eligible Applicants Must be led by an Alberta-based post-secondary institution or a government health entity. Read More Eligible Activities Projects must apply a computational technology of technique that will solve a clinical problem. Read More Deadline to Apply Alberta Innovates’ Accelerating Innovations Into Care program accepts applications on a continuous basis. Apply Now Apply for Funding Give your application the best chance at approval . Mentor Works has an 86% approval rating across all Canadian funding programs . HubSpot Call-to-Action Code Apply for This Program end HubSpot Call-to-Action Code Accelerating Innovations Into Care – Alberta Innovates Amount of Funding Eligible applicants may receive up to $600,000 per project for up to a 36 month period for eligible expenses. A portion of the funds must be used for activities outside the scope of product development. Accelerating Innovations Into Care – Alberta Innovates Eligible Applicants To be accepted for this program, applicants must: Be an Alberta based organization; Led by an Alberta-based post-secondary institution or government health entity; and Must currently have an adequate financial standing with Alberta Innovates and it’s subsidiaries. Accelerating Innovations Into Care – Alberta Innovates Eligible Activities Projects may be eligible if they: Apply a computational technology of technique that will solve a a minimum of one clinical problem; Support a minimum of two health innovation categories within the health innovation cycle; Clearly outline milestones and deliverables; and Adhere to any further Alberta Innovates criteria which may arise. *Please note that Network-based precision health approaches will be prioritized. Accelerating Innovations Into Care – Alberta Innovates Program Deadline The last submission deadline for this program was September 1, 2021 with no current announcements of further intakes. Alberta Innovates’ Accelerating Innovations Into Care program accepts applications on a continuous basis. Apply for Funding We provide an average 95% time savings to our clients, compared to businesses that apply for funding in-house.
